EmailTemplate.name: Automated - YO Rogers - Pin Received
EmailTemplate.subject: Pins Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Thank you for submitting your Google and Bing PIN codes. This email confirms that we have all of the information we need from you in order to complete the setup of your Maps profile pages, key drivers of page one placement.
Our top priority is making your account a successful one, so please don't hesitate to contact us with any questions.
Thanks, Rogers Maps Optimization Team 1-888-450-5716
Clicks Are Great. Calls Are Better. Rogers Communications Inc. 350 Bloor Street East, Toronto, ON M4W 1G9, Canada
